name: Crazy Gems Blitz – Match Three Multiplayer Social Connecting Puzzle Game
name_original: Crazy Gems Blitz – Match Three Multiplayer Social Connecting Puzzle Game
description:
***** Fun! ***** Addicting!
Crazy Gems Blitz - Easy to play, Hard to put down! It’s your skills against the clock! How many points can you rack up? How many can your friends get?

Match three or more Gems horizontally or vertically to clear them. Rack up as many points as you can in 60 seconds! Challenge yourself and your friends in multiplayer mode in this fun and addicting match three puzzle game.

FEATURES:

- Simple, easy, and fun one-touch gameplay
- Challenge your Facebook friends
- Play in multiplayer tournaments
- Enjoy amazing graphics and sound
- Match three style puzzle game
- Game Center leaderboard

Download it today and get in on the fun!
